name: Expecting Groceries
description:
Getting groceries gets wild for soon-to-be dad Lester Quest.

One moment, he’s checking out; the next his beautiful and -very- pregnant wife, Madge Quest, is overcome with ravenous cravings.

He knows there isn’t much time before the check-out clerk loses his cool, but Lester insists on making his wife happy–at any cost.

This punny, super dad knows the clock is ticking.  Summoning his sacred “Dad Powers” he’ll dodge around grocery hazards to get whatever his beloved desires.

However, when the sample lady throws deadly shrimp, Lester has to decide what is more important: getting the goods, or staying alive?

Controls:

Movement Keys: W, A, S, D

[Right-click] to channel your Dad Powers into a concentrated burst of speed towards the mouse. 

[SPACEBAR] to discuss food strategies with your pregnant wife. 

Keep your stress down by dodging past rolling cans, flying jams, and scampi bullets. 

Navigate the treacherous grocery to retrieve the ingredients for a dish most magnificent before time's up! 

Code and Concept by woolamander
Art by annuke
Base sprite by Lokif
Gameplay Theme "Sweet 70s" composed by Clement Panchout
https://www.clementpanchout.com/
